channel.title: [317 pi] Rs-Virtue
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/p7Sf4.png[/img]
Website: [url=http://www.Rs-Virtue.net16.net]www.Rs-Virtue.net16.net[/url] Client Download: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52743041/%5BRV%5Dv0.2.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52743041/%5BRV%5Dv0.2.jar[/url]
There is currently no Webclient/Forums as it is being worked on. What is planned for Rs Virtue? *More unique bosses *Fuly working summoning *Dungeoneering *All skills working *Unique Minigames *Improvemombat *More area's to explore
Features: [SPOILER]*Amazing Combat
*Full Chaotic + PvP Armor Degrading *All Dupes Fixed
*Many Pk Locations
*All Skills Functioning
*Dragon Claws 100%
*Fullscreen
*All Nex Armours With Effect
*Curses 100%
*Quick Prayers
*Skillng Zone
*New Runescape Hitsplats
*Fast Fluid Client
*Perfect Eco
*Amazing Stability
*Perfect Switching
*New Runescape Cursors
*Amazing Graphics
*Xp Counter
*Fun Minigames *Revenant Cave
*Autocasting
*Unique Content
*Full Member System
*Unique Clan Chat System
*Many Trainning Locations
*A Lot Of Bosses
*Fun Killstreak System
*Symbol Support
*Dicing
*Frost Dragons - System[/SPOILER]
Media: [SPOILER] Pick exp mode: [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/2qu6qkl.png[/img] Achievments: [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/21b39dx.png[/img] Market: [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/2eyauk3.png[/img] In-game Highscores: [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/29av9s7.png[/img] Quest tab: [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/21opljm.png[/img] Pk Statue: [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/k99zdl.png[/img] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/al1012.png[/img] Wrath and pk: [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/2vsf5hs.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2hr0h01.png[/img][/SPOILER]
Doing this as a project and to learn more about the codes so don't hate.
